title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 §§ 581-4.6 - Service of paper
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 §§ 581-4.6 - Service of paper

State Regulations

Service of the notice of hearing and complaint and the
agency's determination upon the respondent shall be by certified mail or other
means designed to provide actual notice. Service of any other papers connected
with hearings under this Subpart may be by ordinary mail or
hand-delivery. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
§§
581-4.6

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
